DOC.detailed_description: Analysis cCTA OCT conduct blind independent organization . After unblinding cCTA OCT case identification number , OCT image co-registered cCTA data . After co-registration cCTA OCT lesion location , minimal lumen area ( MLA ) detect modality . FFROCT calculate use OCT-updated model cCTA-based lumen geometry replace OCT-based lumen geometry . DOC.criteria: Patients underwent cCTA prior coronary angiography OCT within 6 month . 1 . Prior coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery 2 . Contraindication beta blocker agent nitrate 3 . Tachycardia significant arrhythmia 4 . Impaired chronic renal function ( eGFR < 30 ) 5 . Subjects know anaphylactic allergy iodinate contrast material 6 .
